description:
According to the example Get SPICE console has a parameter called "type".
This parameter is not listed in the Parameter list of Get SPICE console in the web API reference [1] and not mentioned in Chapter 4.4.13.1 of the pdf API reference [2].
In the web API reference it is not clear that the 2nd example is for the response. Similar bug was reported in [3].

[1]: http://developer.openstack.org/api-ref-compute-v2.1.html#getSPICEConsole
[2]: http://api.openstack.org/api-ref-guides/bk-api-ref.pdf
[3]: https://bugs.launchpad.net/openstack-api-site/+bug/1565670
title: type is missing from the parameter list of Get SPICE console

comments.content:
According to the example Get SPICE console has a parameter called "type".
This parameter is not listed in the Parameter list of Get SPICE console in the web API reference [1] and not mentioned in Chapter 4.4.13.1 of the pdf API reference [2].
In the web API reference it is not clear that the 2nd example is for the response. Similar bug was reported in [3].

[1]: http://developer.openstack.org/api-ref-compute-v2.1.html#getSPICEConsole
[2]: http://api.openstack.org/api-ref-guides/bk-api-ref.pdf
[3]: https://bugs.launchpad.net/openstack-api-site/+bug/1565670
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~gergely-csatari

comments.content:
According to the example Reboot server has a parameter called "type".
This parameter is not listed in the Parameter list of Reboot server in the web API reference [1] and not mentioned in Chapter 4.4.15.1 of the pdf API reference [2].

[1]: http://developer.openstack.org/api-ref-compute-v2.1.html#reboot
[2]: http://api.openstack.org/api-ref-guides/bk-api-ref.pdf
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~gergely-csatari

    api-ref: console types.
    
    Documentation change in api-ref.
    
    type is added to the parameter lists of Get RDP console, Get serial console,
    Get SPICE console, Get VNC console.
